definition: band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise
dew/syrup/nectar/outdoors (not under cover)/to show/to reveal/to betray/to expose

sentences.english: Empress Dowager of the palace and gardens from the withers not a dewy rose.
sentences.chinese: 皇太后的花園及行宮是從不曾凋謝的一支帶露玫瑰。

sentences.english: Women's dresses, dewy lilacs, a song in the valley.
sentences.chinese: 女人的服飾，帶露的丁香，山谷中的歌聲。
